content: this is a legal summary of a court case that took place in arezzo in 2015 the case involved a dispute over the division of an estate between two parties referred to as ca lu and ca eu the court made a final decision and assigned specific properties to each party the total value of the assigned properties was determined and ca eu was ordered to pay a specific amount to ca lu the court divided the expenses and costs between the parties and rejected any additional claims the courts decision was made on february 24 2015
